attributes.action: To increase or get rid of speedlimits on motorways
attributes.additional_details: I would like the goverment to increase the speed limits or compleatly get rid of them on motorways becasue 70mph is to slow. Other countries in europe avarege around 80mph as a max speed limits.
attributes.background: I and many other people would like the goverment to increase the speed limits or compleatly get rid of them on motorways just like the german autobahn

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621223
